00001 
00002 // CStaticLink 1997 Microsoft Systems Journal.
00003 // If this program works, it was written by Paul DiLascia.
00004 // If not, I don't know who wrote it.
00005 // CStaticLink implements a static control that's a hyperlink
00006 // to any file on your desktop or web. You can use it in dialog boxes
00007 // to create hyperlinks to web sites. When clicked, opens the file/URL
00008 //
00009 #include "stdafx.h"
00010 #include "CStaticLink.h"
00011 
00012 IMPLEMENT_DYNAMIC( CStaticLink, CStatic )
00013 
00014 BEGIN_MESSAGE_MAP( CStaticLink, CStatic )
00015     ON_WM_CTLCOLOR_REFLECT()
00016     ON_CONTROL_REFLECT( STN_CLICKED, OnClicked )
00017 END_MESSAGE_MAP()
00018 
00019 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00024 CStaticLink::CStaticLink()
00025 {
00026     mUnvisitedColor = RGB(   0, 0, 255 );     // blue
00027     mVisitedColor   = RGB( 128, 0, 128 );     // purple
00028     mIsVisited      = FALSE;                  // not visited yet
00029 }
00030 
00031 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 afx_msg HBRUSH CStaticLink::CtlColor
00045     (
00046     CDC  * aDC,
00047     UINT   aCtlColor
00048     )
00049 {
00050     ASSERT( aCtlColor == CTLCOLOR_STATIC );
00051 
00052     DWORD dwStyle = GetStyle();
00053     if( !( dwStyle & SS_NOTIFY ) )
00054     {
00055         // Turn on notify flag to get mouse messages and STN_CLICKED.
00056         // Otherwise, I'll never get any mouse clicks!
00057         ::SetWindowLong( m_hWnd, GWL_STYLE, dwStyle | SS_NOTIFY ) ;
00058     }
00059 
00060     HBRUSH hbr = NULL;
00061     if( ( dwStyle & 0xFF ) <= SS_RIGHT )
00062     {
00063         // this is a text control: set up font and colors
00064         if( !(HFONT)mFont )
00065         {
00066             // first time init: create font
00067             LOGFONT lf;
00068             GetFont()->GetObject( sizeof( lf ), &lf );
00069             lf.lfUnderline = TRUE;
00070             mFont.CreateFontIndirect( &lf );
00071         }
00072 
00073         // use underline font and visited/unvisited colors
00074         aDC->SelectObject( &mFont );
00075         aDC->SetTextColor( mIsVisited ? mVisitedColor : mUnvisitedColor );
00076         aDC->SetBkMode( TRANSPARENT );
00077 
00078         // return hollow brush to preserve parent background color
00079         hbr = (HBRUSH)::GetStockObject( HOLLOW_BRUSH );
00080     }
00081     return hbr;
00082 }
00083 
00084 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 void CStaticLink::OnClicked()
00088 {
00089     if( mLinkText.IsEmpty() )          // if URL/filename not set..
00090     {
00091         GetWindowText( mLinkText );    // ..get it from window text
00092     }
00093 
00094     // Call ShellExecute to run the file.
00095     // For an URL, this means opening it in the browser.
00096     ShellExecute( NULL, _T("open"), mLinkText, NULL, NULL, SW_SHOWNORMAL );
00097 
00098     mIsVisited = TRUE;       // (not really--might not have found link)
00099 
00100     Invalidate();            // repaint to show visited color
00101 }
